version_description: Added support for the iPad and a few interface improvements. Fixed a bug that could cause crashes when no location was found.
Added support for the iPad and a few interface improvements. Fixed a bug that could cause crashes when no location was found.
- A minor usability improvements. The app also launches a premium version with the Full Moon Schedule that can be also added in the user's calendar as a calendar item.
- A minor usability improvements. The app also launches a premium version with the Full Moon Schedule that can be also added in the user's calendar as a calendar item.
Improved design and added more settings options  for the distance and and the time display.
Improved design and added more settings options  for the distance and and the time display.

+ White! Moon Tracker has a new white theme that is easier to read.
+ Bug fixes and other improvements!

+ White! Moon Tracker has a new white theme that is easier to read.
+ Bug fixes and other improvements!
+ The app works again with the location service switched off.
+ The app works again with the location service switched off.
We added lunar eclipse and supermoon dates and made a few graphic improvements.
We added lunar eclipse and supermoon dates and made a few graphic improvements.
